Icon.Name: ID23653
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:23653 44,-33,-222 The chest are guarded by mobs. Spiders and rumbler types. If a gnoll spawned behind the explodable wall you will have a key that can open only one chest then it despawns. Heard coin jingle sound on chest i opened. Note you are below the area where the two phantasmials are sometimes they will come down and you can kill them here and the barrel will be left up top. Also you can pull almost all the sulfer emissions down to you.

Icon.Name: ID23652

Icon.Name: ID38423
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:38423 194.00,2.00,1078.00 To obtain entry: claim a darkened shard from /claim then examine it and go to one of those teleporters (avoid the abductors). Access quest is A darkened shard parts 1 and 2. To obtain a teleport crystal: perform part 2 of the access quest to receive a glowing shard. Then you can teleport from anywhere in Norrath to Splitpaw, and then go to the Lower Tunnels teleporter, select Thundering Steppes and zone right to this door. Why would you want to? Well, there are two epic zones in here, and another epic mob near coldwind point, until you get the glowing shard you can't access the epic mobs in splitpaw.
